0010000011010010 0001101011100100 1 -> sum: 0011101110110111, cout: 0
1010011011101100 0010100110010110 0 -> sum: 1101000010000010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
